attributes.action: Instruct Ministers to Listen to the Law Society and the Council of Mortgage Lenders
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ministers should be directed to listen and meet the Law Society and the Council of Mortgage Lenders, whom they have failed to conduct discussions with, to truly understand the devastating effect that the Home Information Pack will have not only on individuals but the housing market in general.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
